# Projecting fish populations with FLasher

# Setting up targets and limits

## Creating a fwdControl object

# FLBiol + FLFisheries

# FLStock

```{r}
data(ple4)

fsr <- fmle(as.FLSR(ple4, model="bevholt"))

control <- fwdControl(data.frame(year=2000:2008, quant="f", value=c(fbar(ple4)[,(44:52)]),
  minAge=2, maxAge=6))

res <- fwd(ple4, control=control, sr=fsr)

```
